name: Avalon Camping Planet
description:
Welcome to the camping planet survival challenge. Being a young mage or wizard, you have taken on the common challenge of the time. It's a great way to brush up on your magic skills, and maybe even discover new spells. Some of the best spells to date where discovered during this challenge. Run around tiny planets, collect animals, and survive. Your ultimate goal is to make s'mores.

I am planing on having weekly updates every Friday.
